0.2.1.name: wordpress/url2link
0.2.1.description:
Insert link with title and summary only input URL.

If you input URL on visual editor. This plugin will fetch title and summary from URL. Then changed to link with summary automatically.

Support:

  • Plugin Homepage
  • Support

Some features:

  • You can embed link easily.
  • You can edit CSS in your theme directory. (url2link.css copy to your theme directory then edit it!)
